data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yan, Chuncai, Liu, Ting, Cao, Wei, Zhao, Guangjun, Liu, Wenbin (2018): A review of the Japanese Cryptochironomus Kieffer, 1918 (Diptera, Chironomidae). ZooKeys 771: 139-155, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.771.24220, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.771.24220
